email_chain.subject: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai - 12,000MT of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 12,000MT of sugar from Santos to Shanghai under FOB terms. Could you provide a freight quote and suggest a suitable vessel for this shipment? We are aiming for a laycan starting around October 15, 2023.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Cargo Transport Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai - 12,000MT of Sugar
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV SEA HORIZON, which has a DWT of 50,000 and an LOA of 200m. The initial freight quote is $45 per metric ton. The vessel is currently in Rotterdam and can be positioned to Santos by October 10, 2023.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai - 12,000MT of Sugar - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $45 per metric ton seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you review and possibly offer a more competitive rate? Additionally, could you confirm the laytime and any potential demurrage charges?

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Cargo Transport Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai - 12,000MT of Sugar - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of $42 per metric ton. The laytime will be 5 days, with a demurrage rate of $12,000 per day thereafter.

Please confirm if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai - 12,000MT of Sugar - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised quote. The rate of $42 per metric ton is acceptable. We confirm the laytime of 5 days and the demurrage rate of $12,000 per day. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Lucas Martin
Cargo Transport Co.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: FOB Santos to Shanghai - 12,000MT of Sugar - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucas,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress. The vessel MV SEA HORIZON will be positioned to Santos by October 10, 2023, as planned.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
Ocean Freight Brokers
